name: Fantasy Madness: Bloodbath
description:
Welcome to Fantasy Madness: Bloodbath!

In this roguelike action-survival game set in a wildpunk World of Fantasy, your goal is to stand against evil forces who want to destroy the natural order.



Collect magical crystals to earn new powers allowing you to summon fierce allies, deadly weapons and digest enchanted mushrooms.



Bring retribution using wide arsenal of arcane powers granted by beloved Mother Nature:
  • Magical staves for more firepower? Checked!
  • Bloodthirsty butterflies offering health transfer? Checked!
  • Blast-bringing squirrel squad? Ready to serve!
  • Deadly vines and roots to stop charging enemies? Of course!
  • Hellish squealing hog for light-speed mobility? On its way!
  • Sweet little carnivore bunnies to rip off throats? As you wish!

Ready to smash down Orcs from the clan of Aluminum Helmets, Dwarves from the BigMine cartel or the Oilmancy Cult? Then go and bring them Bloodbath!!!

Now let’s point out a couple of features:

  • Play one of several different game modes with unique objectives including Elimination, Survival, Conquest, Capture The Mushroom and more,
  • 3 different biomes, each with its own family of enemies (including bosses),
  • 3 unique playable champions, each with its own set of skills,
  • 50 unique skills, each with a special max-level power (20 skills per champion),
  • Pick up to 8 skills out of available 20 to get the most powerful build,
  • Find and equip dozens of powerful Runes and Artifacts to improve your skills and earn new powers,
  • Dark Humor,
  • Cartoonish bloodshed (optional!),
  • A wildpunk theme (fantasy with an “unconventional” twist),
  • Hand-drawn arts,
  • Fast action that requires a little bit of reflexes and dexterity.

Future content?:

  • New enemies and biomes,
  • New game modes,
  • New Artifacts,
  • Random special quests and events,
  • Funny story? Why not!
